main event: A sighting of blinking lights resembling the size of Venus followed an erratic course for over half an hour in Las Vegas.
interesting points: The lights changed course erratically over a duration of about 30 minutes,The reporting officer deemed the witnesses unreliable,The sighting was classified as astronomical in conclusion, The lights were observed while updating intelligence reports in Project Blue Book, There were no photographs included in the documentation.
witness description: The witnesses were considered unreliable by the reporting officer.
